Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball drew in two defenders and dished to an open Brandon Miller, who knocked down a wide-open 3-pointer from the corner to put the Hornets up by 11 with 1:21 left in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Charlotte's starting five finally seemed to gel late in the second quarter when there was good ball movement that created open shots.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlotte dominated Phoenix on the glass, outrebound the Suns 59-42.
